MemeDef.label: underneath
MemeDef.description: We live under everyone and everything. We multiply in the dark and feast on all.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->[deity0_name] exist in dark. Undying and eternally scheming [deity0_pronoun] blessed those closest to [deity0_objective] in the deepest and darkest tunnels.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Tunneler) ->[deity0_name] gnaws on the edges of reality. Infinitely patient [deity0_pronoun] waits for the world to rot away.

intro(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->When the first settlers came to the [place_summary] [place_name], the [deity0_type] [deity0_name] whispered from underground, [deity0_possessive] wisdom seeped from the tunnels.
conflict(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->A blasphemer [foeLeader] proposed that [deity0_name] was of no importance, for [deity0_pronoun] was lesser than the other gods from the warp.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->The prophet [founderName] born from the deepest and darkest tunnels of [place_name], and discovered when [founder_possessive] fellow believers cracked a deep cavern filled with warpstone.

victory(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->The [memberNamePlural] dug a tunnel under the [foeLeader]'s shrine, and [founderName] overran the [foeLeader]'s [foeSoldiers] with his swarm. [founderName] dragged the [foeLeader] down to a deep dungeon and imprisoned [foeLeader_objective].

setup(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->In a shallow and meaningless world the end is the only truth, for all most rot away. [founderName] heard the whispers in the deep and dark cave and found meaning, and founded our movement.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Tunneler) ->[founderName] spread the whispers of thruth to all kin, who would heed the call of the true god [deity0_name].
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->The codex I found in the City of the Deep taught me one lesson above all others:
lesson(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->All things must rot, figuratively or literally.
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->The Horned Rat and his offspring are the worldly reality of this simple truth.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->The bodies of archotechs are deep underground, so their conscious substrate is safe from gamma rays and solar flares. Digging deeper brings people closer to them.
archistFact(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->Archotechs bio-engineered nutrifungus for us so that humanity could thrive underground, close to buried archotech minds.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->[inTheEnd], archotechs will admit us to their subterranean heavens.
animistFact(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->The bedrock is full of prayers to [deity0_name], prayers of hate, envy, or malice.
animistFact(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->The most noble spirits are of hate and malice, pure unadulterated they give validity to the adherents.
animistFact(tag=meme_Tunneler) ->Doubt and negligence doesn't feed [deity0_name], offer all or fear [deity0_pronoun] gnawing teeths.
